attributes.action: PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO  ROCHDALE GROOMING AND ITS COVER UP
attributes.additional_details: again we the people of Rochdale have seen 1st hand the disgusting behaviour of MPS  met police and council service in the covering up of the recent grooming scandels  the lack of action that's been taken so far the dept sunrise team not having the correct resources to stop this raceist attack on young white girls of this town we no longer trust a commission we the people want a public inquiry
